data.title: PH on this is the same as bottled water
data.body: I like the taste of Life Water but there doesn’t seem to be any real benefit to this other than that. I tested the PH on this and bottled water from Target over the weekend and the PH on Life Water and Target bottled water from the store both come in at 6.

data.title: Funny taste. I’m going back to Evian,
data.body: Got this for my elderly mom who if having trouble staying hydrated. She hasn’t mentioned anything about it, but I took a bottle the other day and thought it tasted gross. I normally buy Evian for myself. I hate using all the extra plastic, but I think it’s tasted better than tap, Brit filtered, and all the other waters out there. I find when I actually LIKE the water, I drink a lot more of it.

data.title: Great tasting water at a great price
data.body:
I had originally given a 5-star review for LifeWtr, based on my first purchase and my experience with the product: great-tasting water for a fraction of what I would pay for Smart Water, and based on the fact that this water provides much-needed electrolytes for hydration.

I reordered two cases of LifeWtr recently, and the delivery was delayed by a day. Also, when I received the cases and opened them, the bottles were wet, as if some of the water had leaked out. The bottles were sealed, though, so I can only attribute the wet bottles to the package being mishandled.

As this is a great product, I am willing to purchase it again, but I would STRONGLY advise those who work in the warehouse(s) to be careful with the packaging.

data.title: Good tasting water in large bottles at a bargain price.
data.body:
Though I like drinking coffee and other kinds of beverages my actual favorite beverage is just plain cold purified water and while checking on line I came across this product (Lifewtr premium purified water, 16.9 ounces pack of 12) on Amazon for a bargain price. I purchased it and was impressed with the quick one day service.

I found the water tasted good after being chilled and I like the large size bottles. I am happy with my purchase. If you are into good purified water you may want to check out this product.
Rating: 4 Stars. Joseph J. Truncale (Author: Martial Art and Warrior Haiku and Senryu).

data.title: Good but way overpriced
data.body: I’m updating this review the biggest problem with the brand is price changes and just pricing in general of water that’s from and bottled in Virginia. When I started buying it was $7.48 for 12 of the 16.9 bottle. Now it’s over $13. That price change has been in 12 months. It’s good water but I feel that the pricing is just straight up corporate greed by the company. It’s not related to Amazon price mark ups in anyway. So I no longer recommend this water I recommend the Kroger brand that is the equivalent to this for just about $5 for 24 bottles or another retailer brand equivalent. This is just water. Fuel prices have come down, there’s no major water shortage in areas it comes from Wytheville Virginia. There’s no worker shortage. Maybe the terrible pricing issue is because it’s company based in California where they have constant water problems. But this shouldn’t affect water coming from and being bottled in Virginia.

data.title: The best bottled water to date!
data.body: I’ve had many different water brands. Bought this to try & I hope I never have to switch. It’s almost like an energy drink for me. I can feel drowsy or sluggish and drink a bottle & Im ready to go again. I have it on auto order because I drink a lot of a water & tap water will never be drinkable again. That’s an exaggeration but I love this water. The larger bottles are too full but that’s only a minor complaint. Just hold from bottom of bottle with 33oz size.

data.title: Amazon fulfillment fail
data.body:
I had ordered a webcam set-up (with four small boxes) from a company as a single purchase, and another order I had made for some bottled water. The products were great and I will not give the sellers a bad review. Everything was as expected and ordered and I have zero complaints regarding the product or the seller.

Amazon fulfillment, however, boxed my order of sensitive equipment with bottled water. Like, I have no idea who this person was, but the outcome could have been horrible. Luckily, when the order arrived, and I hooked everything up, it all seemed to work fine. Amazon fulfillment fail - note to fulfillment: do not package sensitive electronics with bottled water in the same box. This could have ended so very, very badly.

data.title: Tastes Fantastic!

data.title: Cleanest, refreshing, clear spring water taste !
data.body: Liked that it reminded me of drinking out of a fresh stream when I was a young child. Just good clear water !! I used to think a bottle of water was a bottle of water, Not so.! There is a big difference, you’ll know by your second solliw. Enjoy the pure clear taste.
